title: netchan hangs
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Compile mpsrv.go
2. ./mpsrv -multiproc=false
3. ./mpsrv -multiproc=true

What is the expected output?

Should send 100k ints with -multiproc=false and -multiproc=true

What do you see instead?

Hangs after a few thousand sends with -multiproc=true

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?

6g

Which operating system are you using?

linux

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)

eedade9a66e8 tip
Attachments: 1. mpsrv.go (2597 bytes)
